Title: Windfall in Athens
Actors: Ellie Lambeti, Giorgos Pappas, Dimitris Horn, Tasso Kavadia
Plot: On a lazy Athenian Sunday, a young and fresh saleswoman loses her soon-to-be winning lottery ticket, only to meet its handsome new owner. Of course, she wants it back; however, what if fortune and ardent Cupid are already on her doorstep?
